arts.ttl: Augsburg’s Finn Dahmen breaks into Bundesliga's all-time top 10 for minutes without conceding a goal
arts.sum: Augsburg's 1-0 win against Wolfsburg on Matchday 26 not only lifted them up to eighth in the standings, it also marked a milestone moment for goalkeeper Finn Dahmen, who moved into the Bundesliga's all-time top 10 for minutes without conceding a goal. While Augsburg celebrated a victory which keeps their hopes of qualifying for Europe alive, Dahmen had an additional reason to smile, after moving alongside the likes of Manuel Neuer and Oliver Kahn in the all-time charts thanks to going 613 minutes without letting in a single goal, including six consecutive clean sheets.

arts.ttl: Hasenhüttl and Grabara speak to the media following Augsburg defeat
arts.sum: Wolfsburg coach Ralph Hasenhüttl and goalkeeper Kamil Grabara answered questions after the visitors' 0-1 defeat in Augsburg on Saturday afternoon.

arts.ttl: Tietz makes the difference as Augsburg defeat Wolfsburg
arts.sum: Philipp Tietz's one-on-one attempt in the fifty-third minute, off a long ball from Cédric Zesiger, confirmed a victory for FC Augsburg against VfL Wolfsburg at the WWK Arena.

arts.ttl: Phillip Tietz strike and Finn Dahmen heroics secure narrow win for Augsburg over Wolfsburg
arts.sum: Augsburg continue their impressive form with a 1-0 win against Wolfsburg, thanks to Phillip Tietz's goal and Finn Dahmen's stellar goalkeeping performance, extending their unbeaten run to nine matches and extending their clean sheet record to over 600 minutes without conceding. Finn Dahmen makes a crucial diving save to maintain Augsburg's clean sheet - IMAGO/kolbert-press/ Martin Agüera

arts.ttl: Augsburg vs. Wolfsburg preview: Two teams separated by three points in pivotal matchup
arts.sum: FC Augsburg (9-8-8, 11th) face VfL Wolfsburg (10-8-7, 7th), with the two teams separated by just three points and still contending for spots in any of the three European competitions.

arts.ttl: Preview: Augsburg vs. Wolfsburg - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Bundesliga clash between Augsburg and Wolfsburg, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.

arts.ttl: Hasenhüttl answers burning questions ahead of crucial Augsburg match
arts.sum: Ralph Hasenhüttl responded to numerous questions about the squad situation in a 22-minute press conference prior to Wolfsburg's away match in Augsburg on Saturday afternoon.

arts.ttl: Jess Thorup discusses Augsburg’s success and competition for positions
arts.sum: FC Augsburg trainer Jess Thorup was all smiles at his Thursday press conference.

arts.ttl: Ralph Hasenhüttl confirms Kamil Grabara’s return; offers further personnel updates
arts.sum: VfL Wolfsburg trainer Ralph Hasenhüttl confirmed that Kamil Grabara will return to reprise his role as the team's #1 this weekend. Hasenhüttl also strongly hinted at starts for captain Maximilian Arnold and versatile winger/fullback Jakub Kaminski.
